skills.name: Flying Cards
skills.description: Throws a sharp card to attack and disturbs the enemy's HP recovery for 2 turns with a 70% chance.

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

skills.name: Surprise Bomb
skills.description: Mounts a bomb on all enemies which detonates after 2 turns. This skill receives 50% additional Accuracy.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Bomb
skill_effect.description: A bomb is planted on a monster, which is set to detonate in a fixed amount of turns. The damage inflicted is proportional to the enemy monster's attack. When the bomb detonates, affected monsters are stunned for 1 turn.
